bibl.title: Ghostly Guests and Venomous Snakes: Traces of Civil War in Horace, Satires 2.8. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Introduction. - Season(ing) of the witch. - Death a the dinner-party. - 'I see dead people': a (g)hostly host and dead diners. - Canidia and Cleopatra.
